smart.description: Treat internet places like locations: organize and search for websites and resources.
smart.title: Smart Bookmarking

host.description: Painlessly set up, host, and run your own instance of Regreso.
host.title: Self-hostable

data.description: Easily import, export, migrate, or delete your data at any time.
data.title: Connect Your Data

LandingHero.subtitle: Effortlessly find your way back to websites, articles, and resources you've visited. Your digital breadcrumbs, always at your fingertips.

LandingPage.finaleSubtitle: Regreso is the digital breadcrumbs tool you never knew you needed. Use locally in the browser or create an account to sync your data
LandingPage.finaleTitle: Ready to Never Lose Your Digital Trail?
LandingPage.openDescription: Regreso is proud to be completely open source. We believe in the community-driven development, transparency, and a commitment to privacy and security.
